Review_Summary: Overall good.. sturdy, spacious, design is nice... Price is reasonable... looks like real teak wood to me.... but I have only 1 complain... I was satisfied untill i realized polishing is not good enough.. Otherwise it is ok.... If polishing quality could be improved it would be a super product...
